DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate change vitamin D status change muscular strength muscular power highly trained athlete 9-month study period . The investigator hypothesize great muscular strength power gain demonstrate athlete achieve maintain 25 ( OH ) -D > 50 ng/mL ( < 100 ng/mL ) 6 month study duration . This hypothesis test carry follow specific aim : Aim 1. determine extent increase serum 25 ( OH ) D > 50 ng/mL associate improve muscular power assess specific performance measure ( e.g . Vertical Jump Test Wingate test ) relative lean body mass ; Aim 2. examine correlation vitamin D status muscular power time .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Vitamin D Supplementation Muscle Power Elite Cyclist
DOC.detailed_description: Study advertise flyer train facility word mouth . Researchers schedule meeting club member train facility . At meeting , researcher give explanation study address concern question may . Cyclist opportunity sign participation sign-up sheet e-mail PI directly minimize chance coercion . Meetings take place training facility Tulsa , Oklahoma Oklahoma City Metropolitan Area . At time , subject complete informed consent along demographic , anthropometric health history , sunlight exposure , calcium food frequency questionnaires PAR Q . All subject ask fill questionnaire train facility various location ensure privacy . After completion appropriate questionnaire , cyclist venous blood dominant arm ( i.e. , ~ 5 cc blood ) collect licensed medical professional serum sample store future analysis vitamin D metabolites ( i.e. , 25-OH-vitamin D 1,25-OH-vitamin D ) parathyroid hormone ( PTH ) concentration . The cyclist 's arm clean alcohol swab , blood drawn sterile vacutainer use sterile needle . At completion blood collection , arm clean use sterile gauze cover band aid minimize risk infection . Samples place ice ice chest process Nutritional Sciences laboratories Oklahoma State University . Subjects undergo skin tone analyse follow evaluation specific performance measure muscular strength power . These performance measure include : vertical jump test Wingate Power Test . All test blood collection take place training facility . Within 4 week complete baseline assessment , investigator meet cyclist training facility . Participants randomly assign placebo vitamin D supplement group . The vitamin D supplementation consist 100 mcg vitamin D/d , take throughout day . Participants achieve 100 mcg take 2 x 25 mcg capsule per day . One take time point ( i.e. , morning evening ) throughout day . Currently , evidence suggest athlete require vitamin D general population age . Although anticipate dose vitamin D use study , produce intoxication ( 150 ng/mL ) , subject exceed 100 ng/ml ( i.e. , upper end normal range ) time ask discontinue study . Studies demonstrate benefit vitamin D supplementation muscular strength muscular power combine vitamin D calcium . Therefore , subject ( placebo vitamin D supplement group ) give commercially available supplement calcium instruct take breakfast . The calcium supplement form calcium citrate ( 500 mg per capsule ) .
DOC.criteria: Elite Cyclist ( level 1,2 3 ) Currently prescribe vitamin D without physician approval participate study Participants respond `` yes ' PARQ get physician approval participate study
